name: Extinctions
effect: In Extinction, You lose Everything. But, also come Everything. This process is of paramount importance in natural selection.

[+20]% Production when constructing [Amphibian] units [in all cities]

uniques: Is Solar System will be destroy by Zeta Reticulians?
Enable Conversation with Aliens after discovering Space Station (with 0.000000001% Chances)

policies.name: End of Daylight
uniques: The Sun converted to Red Giants 5 billion years from now. The expanding Sun is expected to vaporize Mercury as well as Venus, and render Earth uninhabitable. 100% Species will be Died Forever.
